contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Available at a radically low price, this classic button-down Gingham Shirt is made from carbon washed cotton for a crisp, yet soft hand feel. The gingham check is one of the most versatile pieces in your closet, whether its for WFH or date nights.
contentfulProduct.title: Carbon Wash Gingham Shirt

content.value: Buy 1, get any 2nd shirt for 50% off
Buy 2, get any 3rd shirt for free

This classic button-down Gingham Shirt is made from carbon washed cotton for a crisp, yet soft hand feel. The gingham check is one of the most versatile pieces in your closet, whether its for WFH or date nights.
Material: 100% cotton
Double sided carbon peached fabric for a soft hand-feel both inside and out
Lock-stitched premium buttons for long lasting quality
Yarns dyed with AZO-free dyes
Factory is socially compliant with local laws, provides free medical benefits to workers, annual bonus, and fund-saving contributions
Model is 6'0 wearing the men's gingham shirt in a size Medium
Machine wash cold. Gentle cycle. Do not bleach. Tumble dry low. Cool iron or dry clean if needed.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Material: 100% cotton
  • Double sided carbon peached fabric for a soft hand-feel both inside and out
  • Lock-stitched premium buttons for long lasting quality
  • Yarns dyed with AZO-free dyes
  • Factory is socially compliant with local laws, provides free medical benefits to workers, annual bonus, and fund-saving contributions
  • Model is 6'0 wearing the men's gingham shirt in a size Medium

productDescription.productDescription: This classic button-down Gingham Shirt is made from carbon washed cotton for a crisp, yet soft hand feel. The gingham check is one of the most versatile pieces in your closet, whether its for WFH or date nights.

content.value: "Quince’s new rug collection is hand knotted and tufted by artisans in India. Best of all, the prices are fairly reasonable for the top-notch quality you’re getting."
Five-star reviews
Five-star reviews
What our customers are saying
What our customers are saying
"We've got you covered with this very affordable cashmere sweater that somehow clocks in at a miraculous 50 buckeroos."
"New Online Fashion Brand Aims To Get Eco-Friendly Clothes From Factory-To-Closet At Affordable Prices."
Quince Cashmere Robe
- The best robes of 2021."
"While D2C brands have changed the way we shop,
Quince
is looking to change retail even more dramatically."
"A cashmere crewneck for $50?! It’s now a reality — in 10 colors — thanks to Quince."
"The brand connects with factories to sell direct to the customer, promising consumers better prices and factories with better margins."
"The Quince Organic Percale Luxe Sheet Set collection is an excellent choice for anyone who sleeps hot at night."
"You can get a cashmere sweater for only $50 from this radically transparent basics company."
"My next plane outfit when I can travel again."
"These Luxurious Linen Sheets Make Me Feel Like I’m Sleeping in a Fancy Hotel"
